name: Frömmigkeit
description:
Frömmigkeit

> You're the treasurer of the church in Weinsberg, West Francia. 

> Make sure your church survives by funneling money wherever it needs to go.

> Use the arrow keys to allocate your monthly budget. 

> Don't let the red bars reach zero.

> The Green bars signify how much funding each department has.

>The departments are 1. The Clergy, 2. Theology, 3. Infrastructure and 4. Charity.

> The red bars are 1. Reach, 2. Internal Stability, 3. Public Opinion and 4. Following. 

NYU Game Center: Slow Jam - Spring 2020
